snippet.title: Shift'em Mania - Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Shift'em Mania is turn-based tactical ball game with destructible environment where you play against CPU AI or another person via local multiplayer mode.
Download for Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.exicticalgames.shiftemmania
or http://slideme.org/application/shift-em-mania
or https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B01MQGJFV3
Download for Windows desktop: https://existical.itch.io/shiftem-mania

Your objective is to get your color balls to the bottom of a maze filled with ramps, walls, black holes and much more. Block your opponent by pushing your color balls into strategic positions to stop him from doing the same to you. Use walls to your advantage and collect bonus score. Every time you play Shift'em Mania it will provide you exciting, challenging and unique gaming experience due to procedurally generated levels which will never repeat.

Shift'em Mania official website: http://www.existical.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ExisticalGames/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ExisticalGames

Music: Electrodoodle Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
